title: Environmental, Social and Governance at Citi
summary: In the midst of this global pandemic, we remain committed to supporting our clients and community partners to help drive positive social and environmental impact around the world. As we confront the current crisis, we are not only working to manage its short-term impacts, but are preparing for and investing in long-term solutions focused on economic recovery and financial stability.
